Hello everyone who has watched and liked the trailer, we have super good news - Evening Shadows is being released in 4 metro cities - Mumbai, New Delhi, Kolkata and Bengaluru from Jan 11th onwards. Check screening in your city here - https://www.vkaao.com/movie-details/2019/evening-shadows 
More cities/shows being added in a phased manner. 
Tell you friends & family.

I have never seen this type of trailer which emotionally touched to the depth of my heart. I really appreciate Mr. Director sir and team, to be show a simple family mostly Indian's story, as we face problems in family relationship like son-father, man-society and more.     I waiting this movie's releasing as my dream became real.
